head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths BEATTIE, KEVIN M.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths BEATTIE, KEVIN M.

block.p: BEATTIE--Kevin M. On December 5, 2003. Beloved brother of Stanley, Robert and Martha Graham. J.D., University of Michigan '66. Visiting at church 10 AM Tuesday, December 9. St. Boniface mass at 11 AM, Duffield & Willoughby Sts., Brooklyn. Contributions to St. Nicholas Home for the Aged, Brooklyn, NY. Miraglia Funeral Chapels, 718-236-2442.
